import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Ungroup subtasks from group"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/subtasks/group/ungroup/{subtaskGroupId}/{ticketId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Disassociates a ticket's subtasks from a subtask group without deleting the group or the subtasks themselves. The subtasks remain on the ticket but are no longer part of the grouped view.

**Prerequisites**
1. **subtaskGroupId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/my/groups](/docs/api/tickets/get-my-subtask-groups) to list your subtask groups and extract `SubtaskGroupId`.
2. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find the ticket containing grouped subtasks.

**Workflow Example**
1. List groups: [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/my/groups](/docs/api/tickets/get-my-subtask-groups) → find the group containing the ticket
2. Locate ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → extract `Items[].TicketId`
3. Ungroup: [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/ungroup/\{subtaskGroupId\}/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/ungroup-subtask-group-from-ticket)

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/assign](/docs/api/tickets/assign-subtasks-to-group) – Add subtasks back to a group
- [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/remove/\{subtaskGroupId\}/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/remove-subtask-group-from-ticket) – Fully remove group

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}

  parameters={[{"name":"subtaskGroupId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  body={undefined}
